Reviews.Title: m860
Reviews.Author: joel trevino
Reviews.Content: works great, no problems after removing the mirror screen protector. kind of slow , but ok for what I use it for

Reviews.Title: Not a good phone.
Reviews.Author: ursulita35
Reviews.Content: My review is kind of all over the place, but I'm sure you'll get it.......I've had the phone for about 22 days now.  The first thing Cricket told me was the phone should come with an SD Card, and mine did not.  Without that SD Card, I was unable to do lots of things, like use the navigator, or download anymore apps, or take more than 15 pics and 3 videos. When I notified the seller, they were kind enough to send me an SD memory card at no charge.  Once I received the SD card, I was able to download a few games, however, the phone kept saying error, force close or wait.  So, I had to uninstall those apps, so no game playing for me.  A friend of mine has this same phone, and the same thing happened with her phone.  So, it's not just my phone, it's the brand itself.  By the way, my friend got her phone for free with Cricket 3 years ago, and her phone did come with an SD memory card.The other issue with this phone is the touchscreen is terrible on it.  The top of the screen does not work, especially when the phone is turned 'landscape' style (side ways).  Not one of the top or side buttons on the touchscreen works at all.  I have to turn the screen 'portrait' style for it to possibly work.  And this is when trying to text message or play a simple game that I had to uninstall because the touchscreen didn't work.  Also, most of the time there is a delay when typing anything on the touchscreen.  For example if you're typing a text message, and you touch the letter 'r', the 'r' shows up after about 5 seconds.  It's quite annoying.Another issue with the touchscreen, is when I'm in my 'apps' area, when I would touch slightly to select any app, it would not respond to that app, it would respond to a totally different app.  When in my contacts area, anytime I select a contact, there is a picture of a phone and a picture of an envelope.  Anytime I'd select the picture of an envelope to send a text message to that contact, it wouldn't select it, it would just dial the contact.  There is another way to go about sending a text message, but the 'message' button does not work.  This is obviously due to the fact, that the touchscreen is not good on it.A few more things, last but not least, is when I finally received my SD card, I was able to send a video clip via email and text message.  When that contact received that video, it was blurry and pix-elated. Another words, the phone video and pictures are terrible quality. The battery life on the phone is horrible.  Apps on or off, services running or not, it doesn't matter, the battery life lasts less than half a day.  The seller was kind enough to send me a new battery and charger, but it is still the same issue.Don't waste your money on this phone.  Now that I have to send it back, I have to pay for my own shipping and I have to wait to get credit to purchase a phone that works.  By the way, my phone cost me way less than $70 with this seller, and now the seller raised the price to $72, what's the deal with that?

Reviews.Title: i would like a samsung galaxy
Reviews.Author: Brandon Daniel
Reviews.Content: I think its defective or something and I cant upload pics as fast as my other phone and it doesn't have google play store to get more games or widgets etc

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: A. A. "CUDDLES1"
Reviews.Content: The phone is ok. It was missing some pieces to cover up the memory card stick area but it in workable order. Its keep shutting down sometimes and the battery doesnt hold a charge for long. But it is a workable cell phone.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't even turn on!!
Reviews.Author: MICHELLE ORTIZ PEREZ
Reviews.Content: This was sopposedly new but it don't even turn on!! Really disappointed!!! Hoping I can still return it!! Very upset!!

Reviews.Title: Cricket Huawei Ascend M860 great buy.
Reviews.Author: Johnli3
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone one week after it came out.  At $199 it was to much for me at the time and I returned it.  When the Upgrade came out, I bought another. It was $179.  I still have it and it has been dropped and bounce several times over the years.  It still works perfect.  It is the most amazing Phone I have ever owned.Con:  The head phone jack is a Mini mini jack and that's a pain.I'm in the market for a new phone and it is the M8860, can't wait!

Reviews.Title: No internet
Reviews.Author: Victoria garcia
Reviews.Content: The Internet connection was broken I couldn't get on any apps or internet. I tried several times to get it placed

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: JazzyJ
Reviews.Content: This phone just like most cricket wireless phones is wack!! Its crap, garbage, cheap, etc. I've had the phone for a few months. the screen keeps freezing, the phone turns off without warning on a full battery, it says it charging when its not, and worst of all the moth piece is no longer working, so i can't even talk on the dang thing. It should've receive a rating of negative 5!!

Reviews.Content: has not been a good phone,but use untell i get another one ........and be see big u the tree on

Reviews.Content: The phone is a metro pc phone the internet takes for ever to work when it actually dose work My old busted phone operates better then the new one I got...

Reviews.Content: good afternoon, the phone "Cricket huawei" brings no sim card therefore is inservirble in my country Venezuela, I would like to make a product change that I get my hands three days ago. find out and the cell can not be placed online and the wifi does not help, thanks in advance.

Reviews.Title: Not the best phone
Reviews.Author: Rorry
Reviews.Content: Easy to use. However, the battery has no life and it randomly shuts off and is really slow. Not a phone I would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Dont Get It!!
Reviews.Author: Tam
Reviews.Content: When I received the phone it was in really good condition and it arrived on time. After using it for about 2 weeks it started turning off in the middle of conversations, and the web browser is horrible. If you can get a different phone, I suggest you do that.

Reviews.Title: Better than the price
Reviews.Author: David Butler
Reviews.Content: The product was new in the box.No difficult in infomation transfer from old phone to new.Has all the necessary features needed.

Reviews.Title: My first smart phone!
Reviews.Author: Jessica Grills
Reviews.Content: This phone is awesome! So easy to use and it shipped quick. It's a little out of date and some apps dont work though, but it does everything a phone should! Great camera as well

Reviews.Title: Buyer be aware
Reviews.Author: Pepe
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for a friend and sent it directly to her.My friend received a phone with a defective charging port, that renders the unit unusable since it can not charge the battery.I wander, is this a new phone?

Reviews.Title: don't work
Reviews.Author: mark
Reviews.Content: I had bought this phone a couple months ago but didn't have money to transfer my number until now. It would always shut down and reset but I thought it was because there was no service to it. but today when I had my number transfered to it. It still would do it I was told it was the phone and it would cost more then it was worth for the phone. Or that it was reported. whatever that may have ment. so I had to pay for my number and everything to go back to my phone.

Reviews.Title: Huawei Ascend M860
Reviews.Author: Angel M. Pursell "Prettymomma4x"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the phone used with an understanding that it had only a few scratches on it and worked well. I discovered that not only does it have scratches but it's missing the cover that goes over the charger and headphone jack ports AND the back battery cover doesn't stay on. It falls off with the slightest touch constantly. That should have been included as information. I then discover that I could not get into the phone. I was unable to get past the homescreen passcode lock. The previous owner did not unlock it before packing it up. I had to request it. By that time, a cellular salesperson had helped me perform a factory reset. The bonus was the mini SD card they left in it. That was nice. I am happy to have finally upgraded to a touch screen android smartphone and I do like this one. Eventually, I will upgrade again to a much nicer, better Android.
